name: The Revival
description:
Key Features:



Single Player Campaign and Cinematics
Engaging campaign and storyline where you will play as an elite mercenary
taking you to different dangerous places and conflicts around the world.
Including many first person cutscene storytelling.
With the special weapons and equipment which is provided to you, your actions will determine the fate of millions of people.

STORYLINE
In the near future, a mysterious virus of unknown origin has taken over a large portion of the world’s population. It kills the infected within a day. There is a temporary injection treatment which is resets every 1 day. The permanent cure is stolen from the biggest biotech lab in the city that could eradicate the virus.

Your mission is bring the cure back to the biotech lab and fight against top-secret military groups.
What begins as an dangerous mission turns into a deathwish when the militants coming dozens of vehicles filled with hundreds of trained killers
armed to the teeth with assault rifles, grenades, and rocket launchers.
Your team will provide you with any updates and tactical support during the operations and battle if you need it.

Alternate Story and Zombie Mode
What if the virus takes over the whole world, what if you fail your mission ?
Alternate story will take you to the zombie apocalypse.
The permanent cure was never found.
%90 of the world's population turned into monsters because of the virus.
Different story, challenging missions and different weapons...

//Developer's note
We are planning to do alternate story and missions after the full game released.
***Not certain but likely
